privacy-policy-intro.title: Effective date: January 2025
privacy-policy-intro.text: Cobra-game is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how I collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our game and services. By using my game, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.

privacy-policy-1.title: 1. Information I collect
privacy-policy-1.intro: I collect the following information when you create an account or use my services:

list.item-1: Username: To identify you in the game and on the leaderboard.
list.item-2: Country: To display your country on the leaderboard.
list.item-3: Password: Your password is securely encrypted and stored in my database.
list.item-4: Score Data: I store your game scores and update your high score if your latest score is higher.

privacy-policy-2.title: 2. How I Use Your Information
privacy-policy-2.intro: I use your information for the following purposes:

list.item-1: To create and manage your account.
list.item-2: To update and display your scores on the leaderboard.

privacy-policy-3.title: 3. Data Security
privacy-policy-3.intro: I take your data security seriously:

list.item-1: Your password is encrypted and cannot be accessed in its original form.
list.item-2: Your data is stored securely in a MongoDB database, and access is limited to authorized personnel only.

privacy-policy-4.title: 4. Data Sharing
privacy-policy-4.intro: I do not share your personal information, including usernames, countries, or scores, with third parties unless required by law.

privacy-policy-5.title: 5. Your Rights

list.item-1: Access the data we store about you.
list.item-2: Request the deletion of your account and associated data.

privacy-policy-5.contact: To exercise these rights, please contact me at anton@medieinstitutet.se.

privacy-policy-6.title: 6. Changes to This Privacy Policy
privacy-policy-6.intro: I may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted with the updated 'Effective Date.' Continued use of the game constitutes acceptance of the revised policy.

privacy-policy-7.title: 7. Contact Me
privacy-policy-7.intro: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact me at anton@medieinstitutet.se
